timeline.message: Update Character Sets from RPC SPEC
Update Tests and replace CID2SET references

timeline.bodyText: Can we also update the descrption for getCharacterSet()?
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi

timeline.bodyText: Can we remove all formatting changes in this class and keep only the new additions?
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi

replies.bodyText: some of the formatting might be caused by android studio, I checked the file out from develop and reapplied my changes and some of the formatting changes are still present
replies.author: RHenigan

timeline.bodyText: adding  @since SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0 to the old values is confusing because it can be understood that it got added in version 7. Can we update the javadoc to make it more clear that it got deprecated in 7? there should be a more standard way of doing that. if not we can simply remove it.
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi

replies.bodyText: updated to use @deprecated in SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0 instead
replies.author: RHenigan
